title: Announcing the rotating game mode queue

replies.body: It's been asked for for a long time, glad you've heard the community and are doing this awesome thing

Wait................. So towards my understanding, a gamemode will be featured each weekend but during the weekend? You saying that "URF will be shown at least twice" doesn't really make me that excited. Compared to our 2 weeks a year are you telling us we'll get about 4 days?... {{item:3070}}

This^^^^^^^^ Please riot URF is my favorite game mode and I have been looking forward to april for URF for 12 months nearly and now you're saying that it's delayed and we only get it for 4 days instead of 14? Why not just put urf on april 1st like normal and then do the weekend thing later.
Exactly!! {{item:3070}}
SO true
This is a good point, this makes me sad {{item:3070}}
I've never played URF {{item:3070}}
You have never lived...

so just asking is it possible to make this week long instead of only on weekends I'm only asking because more often than not people can be very busy on the weekends and not be able to play their favourite modes to the extent they desire or at all even. if not then that's ok as they say sleep is for the week (getting punny with it)
I hope they put dominion on this rotation, it'd be really great to play it in oce :)
Dominion is on the cards, as are any previous modes. ^_^ Exact lineup still TBD.
That's great! Hide and Seek isn't all lost! That should be an official game mode in my opinion.

So how will this be done patch-wise? Will we have to re-patch every weekend when the gamemodes come online, or will we get one patch with all the gamemodes which will then lay dormant until Riot makes them available?

if you add doom bots please for the love of god dont make illaoi doom bot please... the tentacles would kill us all. but making a gnar doom bot who turns into a mini baron when he changes form would be the best troll in the game ;)
I want that ascension game mode that was fun
I'm excited for this but please put urf on april 1st for the full 2 weeks like normal I have been looking forward to it all year{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
same here {{item:3070}}
Dammmmnnnnn Rioooottttttt, back at it again with the awesome mappssss
Damnnnn Hysterics, back at it again with the awesome comment
Is Ascension on the list? Oh I hope it is! Ascension was so fun!
Yeh ascension that was awsome fun

i actually was hyped up for urf since new year cause i remember that 3 months until my favorite game comes out now that its coming out on a random date where we get 2 days im definitely not gonna enjoy it because im gonna have to binge play and stay awake for 2 days straight, i also wanted to play all the characters and still 1v1 my friend as all the characters
I agree completely I love this idea but I have been looking forward to urf for months they should atleast run the game mode like normal for 2 weeks before this is implemented
I really want to see hide and seek worked into this somehow. Now that the map is gone it might not be do-able but I really liked it; it was my favourite type of game mode.
URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF URF BRING IT Back we love it {{item:3157}} {{champion:103}} {{summoner:4}}

So by any chance will this rotating queue start before April 1st? Just asking since that would be when we are least expecting it like you said. {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:12}} {{summoner:30}} {{summoner:4}}

2 important questions. 

**1)** Will we be able to make any game mode in custom? I'm one to think it's best not to wait until URF rolls around until we can make URF custom games, or if we really want to try beat Doom Bots in our own time with friends. 

**2)** Kind of an expansion on the first question, but will we have a fuller expanse of control over custom games? So, say, Hexakill on Howling Abyss? URF as an All Random game type, like ARAM?

1) Modes will be available in customs when they are on rotation (much like current featured game modes to date). :D

2) Sure, if you want to play Hexakill on Howling Abyss or One For All on Twisted treeline you can do that. We currently don't have plans on a "Random" mode for URF, but you could play in-house customs and use the "?" in champ select?

I had a lot of fun in One for All and have yet to play URF. Excited for the return of both! But the game mode I would really like to see come back are the Doom Bots. I saw so many matches on Youtube and would love to have a go myself and consider the concept of legitimately losing to bots.{{summoner:6}}ing straight to my computer when this comes out.
Is this Rotating game mode unique for OCE or is this happening to all regions?

OMFG NO, IVE BEEN WANTING THIS SO LONG. Like seriously my brother asked me today, if i had three wishes I would wish for more wishes, unlimited Rp and different gamemodes every weekend. Thank you Riot ive wanted this since 2015 urf!
WILL IT BE ON OCEANIA?!??!

sick of nothing being on oceania...

{{champion:6}}
So does this mean it's going to be a different mode each week? Or a randomized playlist with all of them in the table and you get put into one.
It'll be one different mode each week, that rotates in/out on a weekly basis. The playlist of modes is still TBD, but we're building it to be flexible.
I am really excited about this but I have never played URF mode and I am really sad that URF will not be available on the 1st April :(

will we see the return of doombots of doom? i never got to play it
https://imgflip.com/s/meme/Confession-Bear.jpg
If we already have mastery 5 on our champions can we still reap the rewards when Hextech comes out?
Yes, the same reward conditions still apply for you or your premade, being an "S-, S or S+" in your game. :D
Really great that they allow us to further gain mastery points and on top of that when the crafting comes out :D #GonnaHaveSomeFun
i asked for a game mode where all the deleted items are in the shop and are buyable that would be so sick, even heart of gold and even earlier than those items
Calling it URF will be released first of April this year

One game mode I think should definitely be added to the rotation is Butcher's Bridge. I know a lot of people like the randomness of the howling abyss- obviously that's the whole point- but I for one really enjoyed being able to choose whoever I liked in the ARAM format, and team up with friends who can do the same. It had such a stunning set of visuals and the music is (IMO) the best piece yet to come flowing from rito's doors. Keep up the good work!

ADD ULTIMATE BRAVERY TO THE ROSTER!!!

http://www.ultimate-bravery.com/faq.php
can we get some DOOMBOTS please
WOOOOOOOOO IM PUMPED {{champion:222}}
